org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network
Class TopologicalNode

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.TopologicalNode

public class TopologicalNode
extends java.lang.Object

Just represents an topological network node retrieves its information from an topological-generated file (eg. topology-generator)

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
Author:
Thomas Hohnstein

Constructor Summary

          constructs an new node

          constructs an new node including world-coordinates

          constructs an new node including world-coordinates and the nodeName
